channel.title: eos on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in eos on Barefoot Rob

item.title: EOS tea with Se-chan
item.description: (written 18:41 Wednesday 11 September 2019 JST) Well, she did the impossible. Se-chan convinced me that I should sign up for her MLM selling tea because she had found a superwoman with a huge network and she would put her into my downline if I sign up today. Going over the numbers, I will be paying 9500 yen per month for basically bottomless tea, and a likely a bunch of chances to practice Japanese.
